full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): ` SKYES BU RDO RJE LEGS PAR GTOR MA 'BUL BAR 'DOD PA NI, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @003B (ZHES CHOS SKYONG CHEN PO DREGS PA LCAM SRING LA MCHOD GTOR 'BUL BA'I TSUL DANG, SKYES BU RDO RJE LEGS PA LA GSOL MCHOD BYA BA'I RIM PA 'DI @004A *, ,NI MI LA ZHABS DRUNG SKAL BZANG LHUN GRUB KYIS 'DI 'DRA ZHIG DGOS ZHES BSKUL BA LTAR ^SH'AKYA'I DGE SLONG DPAL LDAN YE SHES KYIS SUG BRIS SU BYAS PA'O, ,BKRA SHIS, ,)
